meanings.definition: The act of making decorative frills or pleats in fabric.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed goffering the edges of the tablecloth to make it look fancy.
meanings.sent2: The dress had beautiful goffering along the hem, adding a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The tailor accidentally goffered the curtain too much, making it resemble a ruffled potato chip.
meanings.sent4: Her goffering skills were so precise, it was as if she was sculpting the fabric.
meanings.sent5: The goffering on the pillowcase was so intricate, it looked like delicate lace.

meanings.definition: A decorative frill or pleat made in fabric.
meanings.sent1: The goffering on the dress made it stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: She added a goffering to the curtains to give them a more elegant look.
meanings.sent3: The goffering on the napkins made them look like little fabric waves.
meanings.sent4: The goffering on the pillow resembled a row of tiny fabric mountains.
meanings.sent5: The goffering on the tablecloth was so neat and precise, it looked like it was done by a machine.
